I have not actually completed this game on pc but have on the xbox 360 via orange box. The game is pretty good and the puzzles are somewhat interesting, but leaves something to be desired. For the price this game is great and I definitely recommend it, But Portal 2 is a way better game. If you had to choose between the 2, go with Portal 2. It has many more features and the campaign is more intriguing and story-deep. It's tests are also better in my opinion, meaning they are more interesting, even though they are a bit easier.
Fun and sometimes challenging, but the game is mad short, like really short.

I loved this game and would definitely recommend it to others. The only thing bad part about the game is I didn't get to go in blind like others did. The mechanic is absolutely revolutionary, the story is great and becomes more sinister as you go, I like that it's in the half-life universe, the comedy is hilarious and it's all around incredible. As an incredibly big fan who unfortunately just now got to play this game and unfortunately not very blind at all, i implore others to do it ASAP so you can appreciate the experience even more, as well as the second game.

Has been and always will be a phenomenal game. Has such a unique concept with the portals and how they work. I loved figuring out each puzzle and feeling accomplished afterwards every time. This game has truly changed the gaming world forever and I absolutely recommend picking it up. Even without the sales, the price seems much too low for a game like this. I cannot wait to continue the story in Portal 2 :D
GOOD game
Buen juego, para pasar unas buenas horas de juego

super fun and enjoyable but short

8.8/10

This is a game I've wanted to play for a while, mostly cause I've heard it's a classic, but I really came in with absolutely no knowledge of it. I assumed that it would've been a bit clunky or outdated, but it was GREAT so great that I played it all in one sitting. This game has SUCH a charming storyline and some puzzles that really get your brain going (in a good way).

10/10 recommend better than cake :)
